---
title: "All lectures"
subtitle: "Listing for all lecture material provided in this course."
listing: 
  type: table
  fields: [date, title, subtitle]
  filter-ui: true
  sort-ui: [date, title]
  sort: date
  date-format: iso
  categories: true
  exclude:
    filename: "*index.qmd"
---

This index file tracks all .qmd files in the "topics" directory, to provide a flat view of all lectures that can be organized by date/title/topic/etc.
